titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to transfer a parcel of land to the Iconium Fire Protection District, St. Clair and Benton counties, Missouri, for use as a fire station.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Oversight, Investigations and Emergency Management.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 3/16/2000--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Army to convey to the Iconium Fire Protection District, St. Clair and Benton Counties, Missouri, by quitclaim deed and without consideration, all right, title, and interest of the United States in a specified parcel of land.Mandates reversion of such parcel to the United States if the Secretary determines that it is being used for a purpose other than as a fire station.
